.sprite {
    background-image: url(data:image/png;base64,);
    background-repeat: no-repeat;
    display: block;
}

.sprite-magnifier {
    width: 17px;
    height: 17px;
    background-position: -21px -21px;
}

.sprite-magnifier2 {
    width: 17px;
    height: 17px;
    background-position: -21px -80px;
}

.sprite-magnifier3 {
    width: 17px;
    height: 17px;
    background-position: -21px -139px;
}
